page.title: 13A day in my life(Army)Part 1
page.content: My name is Jennet Storey.I was born in Germany. My dad is in the army,he wears a green uniform & his rank is W.O.2.He fights for England when other countries fight our country.He has to train for it. He works on computers.My mum doesnt work, she's a housewife & stays at home to look after my brother & 3 sisters. I share a bedroom with my sister. In the morning I get up,wash & brush my teeth, then go downstairs & have my breakfast, usually I have a cup of milk.Then I get dressed.I switch the television on & watch while I get my stuff ready for school. I usually take my PE kit con- sisting of PE skirt, Tee-shirt,trainers & plimsolls.I also take my reading book & pencil case. I put my coat & shoes on, give my mum & dad a kiss & walk to school.I go round by the tennis courts & the telephone boxes & past the bus stop. (CONTINUED PAGE 14)
